name: Gang's all here
description:
The Gang's all here!
Control each gang member with a unique key in the keyboard. Keys are assigned based on their initials ----- B for Bob, K for Kim.... You got it. There are 10 of them!

Avoid the SPIKES, beat the CLOCK and SURVIVE the level.

Will you save the gang and get things back to control Or let the things go OUT OF CONTROL!

--- Made for #GMTKJam2020 for the theme "OUT OF CONTROL" ---

BGM and SFX from https://freesound.org/

Enjoy! And share your thoughts in the comments :)
